metadata.name: Distorted Realities
metadata.description:
The Art of Code is a revolutionary marriage between technology and artistry. Using generative programming, it celebrates the mechanical precision of code and its creative potential as an art form. 

Human ingenuity is honoured as digital images become abstract works of beauty. This perfect harmony between man and machine produces mesmerizing visuals that captivate viewers with their complexity, leaving them with a feeling entirely on its own.
